boardgame.name: 18IR
Steam over Holland
boardgame.description: 1839, The Netherlands. The new railways are the way to get rich. Invest your money in the best railway companies. Become the President of one or more companies and lead them to become the best earning companies of the game. Build new track and stations, buy the right trains and push the stock value to new heights. Who will become the most successful investor?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Steam over Holland is an economics game in which the players invest in and control railway companies. The game is part of the 18xx family of games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Steam over Holland_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br /_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;First Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br /_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Publisher: Vendetta
Opened, played once, excellent condition

In mint condition. The box comes in a very sturdy outer sleeve. There were some issues where some of the company tokens didn’t quite match the company charter colours. For instance there was a purple charter but the token was pink. The tokens were just small wooden houses. So I bought a whole set of matching ones for the charters, and they’re much better quality than the originals (which I used for something else so not included). All cards are in premium sleeves. The paper money is unused as we used poker chips. I’ve also printed out and laminated 5 Player Aid / Reference Sheets. Shipping to U.K. only.
Reserved for used diemacher
